channel.title: Comments on: WoW, Mini Patch Day

item.title: By: aaron
item.dc:creator: aaron
item.description: Guess how many raid groups formed on the PTR to test this patch. You guessed it none! The stock blizzard raid UI is totally busted.
item.content:encoded: Guess how many raid groups formed on the PTR to test this patch. You guessed it none! The stock blizzard raid UI is totally busted.

item.title: By: BigFreak
item.dc:creator: BigFreak
item.description: Thanks for that. In return have an amusing name I just found in the list of speakers for DevWeek 2007: "Ingo Rammer". Great stuff.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for that. In return have an amusing name I just found in the list of speakers for DevWeek 2007: “Ingo Rammer”. Great stuff.

item.title: By: Random Poster
item.dc:creator: Random Poster
item.description:
<blockquote>UI API (may require updates to your addons, depending)</blockquote>
I JUST got all of mine working again and now more of them are busted. Seriously could Blizzard PLEASE talk to the mod communtiy more.
item.content:encoded:
UI API (may require updates to your addons, depending)

I JUST got all of mine working again and now more of them are busted. Seriously could Blizzard PLEASE talk to the mod communtiy more.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: That's the <a href="http://eightface.com/wordpress/flickrrss/" rel="nofollow">flickr rss plugin</a>, Big.

item.title: By: chicogrande
item.dc:creator: chicogrande
item.description: Here come the druid hybrid talent changes! We receive more armor, a roguelike Cheap Shot ability, more damage from idols, heck I can even talk to NPC while in cat form...if only I could drink a potion and pick-up Un'goro Soil too.
item.content:encoded: Here come the druid hybrid talent changes! We receive more armor, a roguelike Cheap Shot ability, more damage from idols, heck I can even talk to NPC while in cat form…if only I could drink a potion and pick-up Un’goro Soil too.

item.title: By: BigFreak
item.dc:creator: BigFreak
item.description: OT: How did you get your lovely flickrmajiggy at the bottom of your page going?
item.content:encoded: OT: How did you get your lovely flickrmajiggy at the bottom of your page going?

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Is that "adjustment" in this patch or still just on test? I'm not seeing it in the notes, but I'm not a master of Warlock terminology and talents.
EDIT: Elbows, heh, o ya. Any time I can choose the battle and call the tune, I'm very happy.
item.content:encoded:
Is that “adjustment” in this patch or still just on test? I’m not seeing it in the notes, but I’m not a master of Warlock terminology and talents.

EDIT: Elbows, heh, o ya. Any time I can choose the battle and call the tune, I’m very happy.

item.title: By: Elbows
item.dc:creator: Elbows
item.description: You must be pretty happy about rogues in the expansion from a PVP perspective.
item.content:encoded: You must be pretty happy about rogues in the expansion from a PVP perspective.

item.title: By: Puhase
item.dc:creator: Puhase
item.description: From what I read and what Neth hinted at, its so that Warlocks receive only 90% of their +dmg for these dots instead of the ~120% they had before. If your rolling around with something like +600-800 dmg, prepare to see a signficant dropoff.
item.content:encoded: From what I read and what Neth hinted at, its so that Warlocks receive only 90% of their +dmg for these dots instead of the ~120% they had before. If your rolling around with something like +600-800 dmg, prepare to see a signficant dropoff.
